content: Certain risks and uncertainties like those relating to regulatory developments as well as volume, bad debt and labor cost trends that could cause actual results to differ materially from our projections, estimates and expectations are discussed in the company's SEC filings, including the company's earnings release and related Form 8-K, the Form 10-K for year ended December 31, 2021, and the Form 10-Q for quarters ended March 31, 2022, June 30, 2022, and September 30, 2022, when filed.
